channel.title: =_-¯[317]\/X-Scape Source\/[317]¯-_=
channel.description:
My 2nd source release :) enjoy kiddies!
[b]credits[/b] Delta_ = delta orbs tutorial. Delta_ = DeltaScape base. MoparScape = TUT's and such :)
[size=10pt][b]:WARNING:[/b][/size] [u]Server = 90% Done.[/u]
*************************** ============INFO============ ------------------------------------ *100% eating. *100% delta orbs teleports. *"[b]NEW[/b]" 100% [b]ORIGINAL[/b] pest control :) *100% gold mining area out of fight caves place. *100% barbian assault. *100% castlewars. *100% FightCaves minigame. *63 Jad Waves. *all 24 skills working. *home is in fally. *still need to change ((H)) teleport to falador.. *100% lunars - vengance with skull GFX *100 Ancient Magics - all spells working.. *whole bunch of customs - [all pvp weapons, dragon plate..the 'usual'] *100% pk'ing :) *100% slayer - all NPC's added so you can kill all monsters w/o having to spawn :) * "::hail" "::zombie" command. [the greatest things ever] *100* potting [derrr] *377 cache, 474 map data. *100% full cities. *all prayer working, piety and chivalry. *tormented deamon - with dagg's i think.. *summoning - not yet added 3% done lol.. *construction - not yet added 15% done lol.. *dragon Claws - no spec yet sorry :( *vesta longsword AND spear, spex. *statius warhammer spec. *bandos war spear - no spec yet..haven't taken time to add it.. *need to change home starting place. *100% clan chat :)- moh [who is a ASSHOLE] just checked out how his was set up, based it off of mine. *100% dueling - just need to add the rest of it in - only got interfaces, and send challenge thing. *no skill masters this time..sorry guys :( *max cash is 2147M.. *really REALLY good economy. *i belive: -santa sppears on december 31st. -the grim reaper appears on halloween talk to him to get scythe, and complete minigame to get mask. -easter bunny comes on easter - talk to him to get easter egg/bunny ears. -kill monster from horror from the deep to obtain disk of returning - only on my burfday :) impossible to take out. -leper con comes on st. pat ricks day - talk to get custom charm :). anti leech = NUNE..if u leech just give me come credits.. ======================= Making you're self admin/owner..
PlayerRights = 3 = owner.. to make you're self OFFICAL owner, go into client.java "CTRL+F" "Assassin" and change it to you're username.. =========================== ---PICTURES---\via photobucket =========================== pictures - don't show all of server just some screenshots..their's more to the picture than meets the eye ;) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/castle.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/clan.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/duel.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/hAAAAAAAr.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/haar.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/pickpocket.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/thieving.jpg[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ i didn't really bother uploading that many pictures..i couldn't take pictures of the things i listed above. just read them and you pretty much will have 100% info about the server. :) well here's the thing you're problay all waiting for..or nawt regardless here are the download links:
Filename: X-Scape Source.rar File description: XscapeSourceCreatedByModAssasinOfMoparscape.org File size: 1.47 MB File Download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=FMO8DOP0
as far as clients go, anything with bluurrs cache shall do it..post my client tommrow..tired atm have fun :D
---------------------------------------------------- so what do u need to fix? to make server 100% done.. ---------------------------------------------------- *change starting place to falador. *change ((H)) to take you to falador. thats pretty much it have fun with it guys :)

[/quote]

no i mean when you’re in the [fightcaves i belive, if not idk where…], you right click and theirs the ‘challenge’ option…and pops up the interface, just need to make it 100%…meaning you can offer up items, select things like no food prayer etc…[/quote]

If all you have is the interface you can’t honestly believe your 25% there.

item.title: =_-¯[317]\/X-Scape Source\/[317]¯-_=
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

My 2nd source release enjoy kiddies!

credits
Delta_ = delta orbs tutorial.
Delta_ = DeltaScape base.
MoparScape = TUT’s and such

[size=10pt][/size] Server = 90% Done.

============INFO============

*100% eating.
*100% delta orbs teleports.
*“NEW” 100% ORIGINAL pest control
*100% gold mining area out of fight caves place.
*100% barbian assault.
*100% castlewars.
*100% FightCaves minigame.
*63 Jad Waves.
*all 24 skills working.
*home is in fally.
*still need to change ((H)) teleport to falador…
*100% lunars - vengance with skull GFX
*100 Ancient Magics - all spells working…
*whole bunch of customs - [all pvp weapons, dragon plate…the ‘usual’]
*100% pk’ing
*100% slayer - all NPC’s added so you can kill all monsters w/o having to spawn

  • “::hail” “::zombie” command. [the greatest things ever]
    100 potting [derrr]
    *377 cache, 474 map data.
    *100% full cities.
    *all prayer working, piety and chivalry.
    *tormented deamon - with dagg’s i think…
    *summoning - not yet added 3% done lol…
    *construction - not yet added 15% done lol…
    *dragon Claws - no spec yet sorry
    *vesta longsword AND spear, spex.
    *statius warhammer spec.
    *bandos war spear - no spec yet…haven’t taken time to add it…
    *need to change home starting place.
    *100% clan chat :)- moh [who is a ASSHOLE] just checked out how his was set up, based it off of mine.
    *100% dueling - just need to add the rest of it in - only got interfaces, and send challenge thing.
    *no skill masters this time…sorry guys
    *max cash is 2147M…
    *really REALLY good economy.
    *i belive:
    -santa sppears on december 31st.
    -the grim reaper appears on halloween talk to him to get scythe, and complete minigame to get mask.
    -easter bunny comes on easter - talk to him to get easter egg/bunny ears.
    -kill monster from horror from the deep to obtain disk of returning - only on my burfday impossible to take out.
    -leper con comes on st. pat ricks day - talk to get custom charm :).
    anti leech = NUNE…if u leech just give me come credits…
    =======================
    Making you’re self admin/owner…

PlayerRights = 3 = owner…
to make you’re self OFFICAL owner, go into client.java “CTRL+F” “Assassin” and change it to you’re username…

—PICTURES—\via photobucket

pictures - don’t show all of server just some screenshots…their’s more to the picture than meets the eye

i didn’t really bother uploading that many pictures…i couldn’t take pictures of the things i listed above. just read them and you pretty much will have 100% info about the server. well here’s the thing you’re problay all waiting for…or nawt regardless here are the download links:

Filename: X-Scape Source.rar
File description: XscapeSourceCreatedByModAssasinOfMoparscape.org
File size: 1.47 MB
File Download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=FMO8DOP0

as far as clients go, anything with bluurrs cache shall do it…post my client tommrow…tired atm have fun

so what do u need to fix? to make server 100% done…

*change starting place to falador.
*change ((H)) to take you to falador.
thats pretty much it have fun with it guys
